predicate.note: Frames file for 'prescribe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Reports by the Office of Technology Assessment do n't prescribe any specific legislative action but suggest a range of options that Congress may pursue [*T*-1] .

roleset.name: to order a medicine or other treatment

example.name: all arguments
example.text: '' Folk doctors also prescribe it for kidney , bladder and urethra problems , duodenal ulcers and hemorrhoids .
